verses.verse: Not unto us, Lord; not unto us. But to thy name only give the glory: for thy mercy and for thy truth.
Perhaps the nations may say, Where is their God?
Our God is in heaven and on earth: all that he willed, he hath done.
The idols of the nations are silver and gold; the workmanship of men's hands.
They have a mouth but cannot speak: though they have eyes, they cannot see.
Ears they have, but they cannot hear: having nostrils they cannot smell.
They have hands but they cannot feel: They have feet, but they cannot walk: nor can they utter a sound with their throat.
Let them who make them be like them; and all who have trusted in them.
The house of Israel have trusted in the Lord: he is their helper and protector.
The house of Aaron have trusted in the Lord; he is their helper and protector.
They who fear the Lord have trusted in him: he is their helper and protector.
The Lord hath remembered us and blessed us: he hath blessed the house of Israel: he hath blessed the house of Aaron:
he hath blessed them, who fear the Lord, both small and great.
May the Lord add to you more and more; to you and to your children
May you be blessed by the Lord: who made the heaven and the earth.
To the Lord belongeth the heaven of heavens: and he hath given the earth to the sons of men.
The dead cannot praise thee, O Lord; nor any who go down to the mansion of the dead:
but we who are alive will bless the Lord; from this time forth and forever.
